citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 1:20-1:50pm
on March 30, 2022. The inspector called the contact number and waited for 30 minutes, but was unable to reach the
licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 1:20-1:50pm 
on March 30, 2022.  The inspector called the contact number and waited for 30 minutes, but was unable to reach the 
licensee. 
 
 
 
End Section
